description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. A Starship themed slot machine game. The slot machines feature spin, hold and nudge abilities. The game includes medals which are gained for certain accomplishments, and a small shop to spend any winnings. Purchases from the shop include 'Autonomous Avatars' which happily play slot machines along side you. The player can look around, which if used in the right way can help maximize winnings...
